attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Council Tax was first introduced in 1993. Since then it has risen dramatically to the point where today it is far too expensive and the average family is struggling to pay it. The government managed without charging Council Tax for all those years prior to 1993 so why should we put up with such a burden now, especially when we see very little for our money?
This petition is to request that the government do away with Council Tax so the struggle and burden are removed.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Abolish Council Tax."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17707


Prime Minister's Office
